title: jazzvenue
author: jazzvenue
created_time: August 31, 2023, 10:53:27 AMLast edit: September 04, 2023, 10:22:58 AM by jazzvenue
content: Hi to all Bitcointalk members, whether you are a newcomer or someone who understands and uses cryptocurrencies often, you all want to get in to solid new crypto projects with high potential of upside in the near and long term. And there are tons of useful crypto newsletters out there, which can help/guide you through the vast universe of tokens, avoid turbulences along the way and lead you in profitable trades and future gains.If this is the case, then my services will be a great value for you. It's very hard and time consuming to weed out the good projects out there. By buying any of the below packages you gain access to regular reports from high-esteemed and reputable crypto publications:Palm Beach Confidential by Teeka Tiwari (Palm Beach Group)Palm Beach Pioneer by Teeka Tiwari (Palm Beach Group)Palm Beach Crypto Income by Teeka Tiwari (Palm Beach Group)Crypto Capital by Eric Wade (Stansberry Research)Crypto Cashflow by Eric Wade (Stansberry Research)Early-Stage Crypto Investor by James Altucher (Paradigm Press)Weiss Crypto Portfolio by Juan Villavarde (Weiss Ratings)These reports usually come in on monthly basis, with a few updates during the month and occasionally some special reports throughout the year. What a better way and perfect time to get ready for the next bull market ðŸš€!You can also ask me for any other crypto newsletter of your own choice, and I will seek to find away to get that as well for you in a very discounted price. Just name the publication to me and I will respond back to you if I can get that for youÂ  .And to point out the affordability of my services below, which is just one tenth of their original prices in most casesÂ  : PublicationsPalm Beach ConfidentialPalm Beach PioneerPalm Beach Crypto IncomeCrypto CapitalCrypto CashflowWeiss Crypto PortfolioEarly-Stage Crypto InvestorRetail Cost 5000$5000$4000$5000$5000$5000$5000$Through my services500$500$500$500$500$500$500$Savings with me4500$4500$4500$4500$4500$4500$4500$What you get is simply direct access to these newsletters with your own login details as you had paid them yourself the enormous membership fee, but instead you receive the access trough my services with a staggering -90% discountÂ  !Most of these crypto projects are meant for medium to long term investing (not short-term trading) and crypto space is extremely volatile, so pay attention and do not overdo it with moonshot dreaming goals.Whoever is interested to join any publication mentioned above or has one in mind that wants get his/her hands to it, just can DM me here on my thread / contact me in telegram @tssssy4 / or email me at [mailto:color=blue]jazzvenue352@gmail.com[/color]

comments.author: elineli
comments.body: Interested, please sent a PM for further details!

comments.author: jazzvenue
comments.body: Quote from: elineli on September 02, 2023, 10:46:48 PMInterested, please sent a PM for further details!Sent you DM with details. Check pls.

comments.author: elineli
comments.body: The service provided by @jazzvenue is right to the point and then some! Though a bit sceptical at first, I got solid reassurances from the seller and received all the login details to Palm Beach Confidential for 1 year membership, just as I would have if I went to them directly and paid their extravagant joining fee. Come on $5 grand are a huge price-tag for a single publication no matter how good it is, and I got that with just one tenth of that price ! Notwithstanding the fact that I have just now taken up his service, my honest feedback at this moment is that he delivers what promised 100%, nothing to suggest otherwise so far at least.
